isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - LIGHT SYSTEMS - OPERATION

svcsubsecinfo.para: Refer to the LIGHT SYSTEMS circuit diagrams in CTS-5298 or S08225.

svcproc.title: Back-Up Lights
svcproc.para: When the ignition switch is in the (ignition position), the ignition relay energizes and power is supplied to fuse F4-C. When the transmission is placed into reverse, the back-up light switch closes and power flows to the back-up lights. Power flows from fuse F4-C through circuit 71, a white wire, back-up switch (230), a black wire, circuit 71A, the left and right back-up lights, and ground circuit 11-GV.
